class LineJoints(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        t1 = Triangle()
        t2 = Triangle(joint_type=LineJointType.ROUND)
        t3 = Triangle(joint_type=LineJointType.BEVEL)

        grp = VGroup(t1, t2, t3).arrange(RIGHT)
        grp.set(width=config.frame_width - 1)

        self.add(grp)
